General.Name: Kioson Komersial Indonesia Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Kioson Komersial Indonesia Tbk, a technology company, engages in online trading and e-commerce business in Indonesia. It provides software and hardware platforms to support micro, small and middle businesses through Kioson Cash Point, a partnership system integrated with grocery stores. The company products also include RetailKita, that offers FMCG products distribution channels for MSMEs and grocery stores, and warehousing services. It is involved in provision of transportation trading and transportation services. The company was founded in 2015 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia. PT Kioson Komersial Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Artav Mobile Indonesia.
General.Address: AXA Tower Kuningan City, Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia, 12940
